name: XWUI Separator Component
description: Visual separator/divider component for dividing content sections. Supports horizontal and vertical orientations, optional label text, and decorative mode for accessibility.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

decorative.description: Whether the separator is decorative (no semantic meaning)

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the separator

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

label.description: Optional label text to display with the separator
